name: T:T - TimeTanks | McMelon
description:
Time Tanks : A time-manipulating tank fighting game! Time Tanks is there! In this 2D-shooter you fight against 35 other tanks in a big arena. Filled with loud ,big explosions and bullets everywhere you must dodge them and shoot the tanks up! You also have a special ability: You can slow time down! So have fun and kill as much tanks as possible! :) Carpe diem, McMelon --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- How to play: [W|A|S|D] = Movement [Mousepointer] = Shoot direction [Left mouse key] = SHOOT [Spacebar] (Press and hold) = SlowMotion TimeLiquid:   

Decreases when: Hit / SlowMotion used

Increased when: Enemies killed
When 0 then you DIE!
